commit.message:
Fix parsing of `git ls-tree` for submodules

Closes #1282
Clear keybinding from all keymaps (unbind) with `bind generic <key> none`

Improve the blob view experience

* Fix opening the blob view for the same file from a different commit.

* Set %(file) rather than %(file_old) in the blame view to allow the
  blob view to open properly.

* Allow faster access to the blob view when using `tig <file>`.
Reset state variables when selecting a commit with no reference
Show the selected commit in the blame view title window

refdb: ignore prefetch refs (#1318)

* refdb: add prefetch reference type

* tigrc: document fallback for reference-format

* tigrc: hide prefetch references by default

These are created by `git maintenance` and are special-cased in git
tools to not be shown, since they are mostly noise.
Fix regression introduced in e2f1af4

Fix untracked changes staging behaviour in plain stage view

* Close the view after staging an untracked file.

* Fix issue with 11238ef7fb35ab769cf673c1f90b99bc634c7d13 and maximized
  views to allow the use of WATCH_INDEX trigger.
Minor update to tigrc and doc
Update NEWS
Bump copyright year to 2024

Fix chunk staging behaviour in plain stage view

* Reflect changes in the Untracked / Unstaged / Staged changes lines
  when returning to the main view after partial staging / unstaging.

* Close the view after staging the last chunk.

Allow to go to stage view without Enter

Simplified version of PR #1284. Test is from the original PR.

Closes #1284

Original-patch-by: Johannes Altmanninger <aclopte@gmail.com>

Fix status view lockup

Steps to reproduce:
- go to the status view
- open a split stage view from a file
- move cursor in the status view to a `(no files)` line
- maximize the stage view

Close the stage view when the selected line in the status view does not
point to a valid stage content.

Move default log view options to tigrc

This allows to remove the resource-intensive `--cc --stat` when dealing
with large repositories. It can be done on a per repository basis with
`git config tig.log-options ''`.

Use HTTPS for GitHub clone URLs (#1310)

GitHub has dropped support for the git:// protocol:
https://github.blog/changelog/2022-03-15-removed-unencrypted-git-protocol-and-certain-ssh-keys/

Use HTTPS for GitHub clone URLs (#1310)

GitHub has dropped support for the git:// protocol:
https://github.blog/changelog/2022-03-15-removed-unencrypted-git-protocol-and-certain-ssh-keys/

commit.message:
Fix tig blame --reverse

Fixes #1300
Fixed an issue where is*() function argument was not cast as unsigned char.

Support %(text) in all views with a text column

PR #457 implemented %(text) for the pager view only. Extend %(text) support
to the blame, blob, grep and log views.

Fixes #1275

Fix readline echo when stdin is redirected

Fixes #1229

Also use lightweight tags in the Refs line of the diff view

Closes #1235
Update GitHub checkout action to v4

Fix display non-ascii character (#1299)

[tk: added missing occurences and fixed behaviour on macOS]
Cast the argument passed to is*() function in ctype.h to unsigned char.

Update utf8proc to v2.9.0

Unicode 15.1 support

Fix refresh-mode periodic not updating branch labels

This is a regression from #991. Bring back and improve correction from #591.

Fixes #1270
Enforce a blank before view scroll percentage

update_view_title: Fix NULL dereference at startup (#1293)

update_view_title can be called with a `struct view`
where `line` is NULL, and `lines` is 0.

Add a check for the value of line where it's first used.

update_view_title: Fix NULL dereference at startup (#1293)

update_view_title can be called with a `struct view`
where `line` is NULL, and `lines` is 0.

Add a check for the value of line where it's first used.

commit.message: Fix macOS CI
